attributes.action: abolish  planning permission for small scale home wind generators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
abolish the need for all planning permission for small domestic wind turbines with blades up to 2metres in diameter.

the charges and delays for such permission is counter productive to those responsible home owners attempting to reduce their carbon footprint.

the visual impact of small scale wind generators is low compared to the urgent need to reduce co2 levels.
